ggsci 2.9
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ggsci 3.0 (2019-02-22) Unreleased

New Features

  • Added COSMIC color palettes. See scale_color_cosmic() and scale_fill_cosmic() for details. We thank Joshua H. Cook for contributing the color palettes.

ggsci 2.9 (2018-05-13) 2018-05-14

Improvements

  • New URL for the documentation website: https://nanx.me/ggsci/.

ggsci 2.8 (2017-09-30) 2017-09-30

Improvements

  • Use system font stack instead of Google Fonts in vignettes to avoid pandoc SSL issue.

ggsci 2.7 (2017-06-12) 2017-06-12

New Features

Two new discrete color palettes:

  • JAMA
  • Tron Legacy

One new collection of continuous palettes with 19 color options:

  • Material Design

ggsci 2.4 (2017-03-07) 2017-03-08

New Features

Four new discrete color palettes:

  • NEJM
  • LocusZoom
  • IGV
  • Star Trek

ggsci 2.0 (2016-11-20) 2016-11-21

New Features

Two new discrete color palettes:

  • D3.js (v3)
  • Futurama (Planet Express)

The first continuous color palette:

  • GSEA GenePattern

ggsci 1.0 (2016-04-01) Unreleased

New Features

Eight discrete color palettes:

  • NPG
  • AAAS
  • Lancet
  • JCO
  • UCSCGB
  • UChicago
  • The Simpsons (Springfield)
  • Rick and Morty (Schwifty)
